summary: On a night of despair after being turned down continuously for the scripts he writes, Metin ends up in a bar where he meets a girl named Duygu. After spending the night together, she walks ... See full summary »
cast: Sezai Paracikoglu|Melike Güner|Sinan Çaliskanoglu|Barbara Lourens|Mehmet Selim Akgul|Mustafa Uzunyilmaz|Batur Belirdi|Nevin Efe|Hasan Yalnizoglu|Serkan Duran|Erol Agirlar|Yalçin Seref Agirlar|Alp Aslan Ataman|Asim Ertürk|Begüm Meriç|Duygu Paracikoglu|Sevim Tasir|Mertcan Tekin|Serap Ceylan Tonguc|Nihat Uzdur|Yilmaz Öztürk
title: Incir Reçeli
